metadata.title: CVE-2023-3108 on Ubuntu 24.04 LTS. (noble) - medium
metadata.description: A flaw was found in the subsequent get_user_pages_fast in the Linuxkernelâ€™s interface for symmetric key cipher algorithms in theskcipher_recvmsg of crypto/algif_skcipher.c function. This flaw allows alocal user to crash the system.
